ValidationRule.description: When User Select Local Cheque of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection then not entering data in Forex Amount
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Mode__c , 'Local Cheque') , ISPICKVAL( Mode_Selection__c , 'Rupees') , ISBLANK( FOREX__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: After Selecting Local Cheque of Mode PickList and Rupees of Mode Selection Pick List,Forex Amount cann't be blank.
